title: 3 and Out - Broncos/Chargers MNF, Packers Problems, Bama Dynasty Wrap, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Broncos/Chargers MNF, Packers Problems, Bama Dynasty Wrap, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Chargers outlasting the Broncos on MNF, and why he didn’t like what he saw from either team. He also discusses why the Packers should have never let Davante Adams walk, how the Jets have turned it around to start the season, and why the NIL era could mark the end of Nick Saban and Bama’s dynasty. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
